Basics

Source: vignettes/tutorial/basics_calcFeatureByGroup.Rmd
basics_calcFeatureByGroup.Rmd

calcFeatureByGroup

library(fxtract)
df = data.frame(id = c(rep(1, 10), rep(2, 10)))
df$task = rep(c(rep("task1", 5), rep("task2", 5)), 2)
df$hour = rep(c(rep("hour1", 3), rep("hour2", 2), rep("hour1", 2), rep("hour2", 3)), 2)
df$x = rnorm(20)
df
##    id  task  hour           x
## 1   1 task1 hour1 -0.16545934
## 2   1 task1 hour1 -0.49508731
## 3   1 task1 hour1 -0.08971977
## 4   1 task1 hour2  0.20626827
## 5   1 task1 hour2  2.49626046
## 6   1 task2 hour1  0.66432308
## 7   1 task2 hour1  0.19954825
## 8   1 task2 hour2  1.21256312
## 9   1 task2 hour2  0.70984334
## 10  1 task2 hour2  0.36383302
## 11  2 task1 hour1 -0.32023835
## 12  2 task1 hour1 -0.69045432
## 13  2 task1 hour1  1.49935584
## 14  2 task1 hour2  1.77934246
## 15  2 task1 hour2 -0.38021044
## 16  2 task2 hour1  0.09064310
## 17  2 task2 hour1 -1.01032561
## 18  2 task2 hour2 -1.00327658
## 19  2 task2 hour2  1.18566044
## 20  2 task2 hour2 -1.20422629

return 1 value each

max_x = function(data) {
  max(data$x)
}
calcFeatureByGroup(df, group_col = "id", fun = max_x)
##   id    max_x
## 1  1 2.496260
## 2  2 1.779342

return more values at once

more_features = function(data) {
  data.frame(max_x = max(data$x), sd_x = sd(data$x))
}
calcFeatureByGroup(df, group_col = "id", fun = more_features)
##   id    max_x      sd_x
## 1  1 2.496260 0.8523618
## 2  2 1.779342 1.1070064

group by two columns

calcFeatureByGroup(df, group_col = c("id", "task"), fun = more_features)
##   id max_x_task1 max_x_task2 sd_x_task1 sd_x_task2
## 1  1    2.496260    1.212563   1.203343  0.3882867
## 2  2    1.779342    1.185660   1.164604  1.0170528

group by three colums

calcFeatureByGroup(df, group_col = c("id", "task", "hour"), fun = more_features)
##   id max_x_task1_hour1 max_x_task1_hour2 max_x_task2_hour1
## 1  1       -0.08971977          2.496260         0.6643231
## 2  2        1.49935584          1.779342         0.0906431
##   max_x_task2_hour2 sd_x_task1_hour1 sd_x_task1_hour2 sd_x_task2_hour1
## 1          1.212563         0.215528         1.619269        0.3286454
## 2          1.185660         1.172124         1.527035        0.7785024
##   sd_x_task2_hour2
## 1        0.4267695
## 2        1.3256058
